entry.title: Douglas County youth triumph at 2025 Oregon 4-H Spring Classic

entry.title: Douglas County Enters 2025 Fire Season: What You Need to Know
entry.summary: Fire season is now in effect across the Douglas District. DFPA has set Public Use Restrictions to “Moderate” and Industrial Fire Precaution Level to 1. Campfires are limited, off-road driving is restricted, and chainsaw or mowing hours are now reduced to prevent wildfire risk.

entry.title: Amidst move to ban syringe exchange on city property, HIV Alliance halts exchange at parks
entry.summary: As of early May, HIV Alliance, a nonprofit that provides care to those affected by or at risk for HIV in Oregon, has halted syringe exchange programs out of Roseburg city property.

entry.title: Bill passes to stop illegal cannabis grows
